data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 1, Free kick Famalicao.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Famalicao have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 3, Famalicao's Gil Dias gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Hugo Miguel signals a Portimonense throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, At Estadio Municipal de Portimao, Portimonense are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Famalicao.
Portimonense are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Famalicao.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Hugo Miguel awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Portimonense.
In the minute 15, Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Portimonense surge into the attack at Estadio Municipal de Portimao but Anderson de Oliveira da Silva’s header is off-target.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Hugo Miguel signals a Famalicao throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Free kick Famalicao.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Famalicao needs to be cautious. Portimonense have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Portimonense.
Hugo Miguel awards the home team a throw-in.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 23, Fabricio of Portimonense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
In the minute 24, Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Throw-in Famalicao.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 25, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense just outside Famalicao's area.
Dani Morer for Famalicao has been booked by Hugo Miguel and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 27, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
Throw-in high up the field for Portimonense in Portimao.
Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Famalicao to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
Hugo Miguel signals a Famalicao throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Famalicao.
In the minute 29, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Famalicao.
In the minute 30, Can Portimonense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Famalicao's half?
Hugo Miguel awards the away team a throw-in.
Famalicao are pushing forward but Ruben Del Campo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Portimonense's Fabricio gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Famalicao.
Portimonense's Luquinha is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Famalicao.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Portimonense.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a throw-in for Portimonense, close to Famalicao's area.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Hugo Miguel awards the home team a throw-in.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Portimonense close to the penalty box.
Famalicao needs to be cautious. Portimonense have an attacking throw-in.
Hugo Miguel signals a Portimonense throw-in in Famalicao's half.
In the minute 42, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Famalicao advance rapidly upfield but Hugo Miguel blows for offside.
Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Edwin Herrera is replacing Dani Morer for the away team.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
In the minute 48, Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Famalicao.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 50, Free kick in a good position for Portimonense!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Throw-in for Famalicao close to the penalty box.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Hugo Miguel awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Municipal de Portimao, Dener has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Famalicao.
Hugo Miguel awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Famalicao.
In the minute 59, Willyan Rocha (Portimonense) has received a first yellow card.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guga (Famalicao) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Can Famalicao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portimonense's half?
In the minute 62, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Portimonense close to the penalty box.
Joaquin Pereyra (Famalicao) has received a yellow card from Hugo Miguel.
Important block from the Famalicao defence as Luquinha fires in a strike for Portimonense.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Famalicao.
In the minute 65, Portimonense attack but Willyan Rocha's header doesn't find the target.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
In the minute 67, Famalicao to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
The away team have replaced Ruben Lameiras with Jhonata Robert. This is the second substitution made today by Joao Pedro Sousa.
Famalicao make their third substitution with Patrick William replacing Ivan Jaime.
In the minute 69, Luquinha (Portimonense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portimao.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 71, Hugo Miguel signals a Famalicao throw-in in Portimonense's half.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 73, Hugo Miguel waits before resuming play because Aylton Boa Morte for Portimonense is still down.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Portimonense’s Aylton Boa Morte is on his feet again at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 75, Hugo Miguel signals a Portimonense throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Portimonense's Aylton Boa Morte has been booked in Portimao.
Portimonense drives forward and Anderson de Oliveira da Silva gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 76, Paulo Sergio is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Municipal de Portimao with Julio Cesar replacing Aylton Boa Morte.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
In the minute 77, Famalicao have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Famalicao.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
The away team replace Guga with Joao Neto.
In the minute 80, Famalicao have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 81, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Beto is on a sub for Fabricio for Portimonense.
Paulo Sergio (Portimonense) is making a third substitution, with Welinton Junior replacing Anderson de Oliveira da Silva.
In the minute 83, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Portimonense in Portimao.
In the minute 84, Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Throw-in Famalicao.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Famalicao.
Welinton Junior (Portimonense) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 87, In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Riccieli is replacing Jordao for the away team.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Portimonense.
In Portimao, Beto (Portimonense) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Famalicao to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Hugo Miguel signals a throw-in for Portimonense, close to Famalicao's area.
Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Portimonense.
Free kick Famalicao.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Fernando Medeiros is replacing Luquinha for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
